definitions.title: adv. 1. interrog.
definitions.body: In what manner? ti/nitro/pw|; (rather more definite than [[אֵיח]] = pw=v); De 1:12, De 7:17, De 12:30, De 18:21, De 32:30, Ju Jdg 20:3 (indirect sentence) 2Ki 6:15, Je 8:8, Ps 73:11.
exclam. How! (slightly more emph. than [[אֵיח]]) Is 1:21, Je 48:17, La 1:1, La 2:1, La 4:1, La 4:2.
Where? (prop. north-Isr.; cf. Aram. [[אֵיכָא]], 0’ayk0 where ? Cf. Dr:Intr. 178, 421) only 2Ki 6:13 Kt Ct So 1:7, So 1:7, —each time in an indirect sentence.
